website_summaries.verdict: A large pool float with a fun design that can comfortably fit one adult or a few kids.
pros: The rubber duck design is charming, and the large size of this float makes it easy to relax without fear of falling off
Acts as a centerpiece for your pool
cons: Giant size may be a negative for owners of smaller pools

customer_reviews.title: A relaxing toy not a rowdy toy
customer_reviews.text: This floatie is really cool and really big. However, kids love to jump on and off them, pile on lots of kids, pull each other off etc. The duck cannot take it. We've owned the flamingo, swan, duck and unicorn and none of them last more than a few afternoons. Would definitely recommend for adults. Not rowdy kids
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool floatie
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool floatie! Fun to have in the pool or on the lake and very comfortable to sprawl out and relax out on the water. Only thing with this floatie compared to the gigantic flamingo is being that the wings aren't as large as the flamingo, the duck is easier to tip over in. Just have to be careful not to lean to far to either side or back because I've seen so many people flip over on this raft. Still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: cool but not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool inflatable, but then it popped. The product feels like good quality, so I was confused and disappointed when one day it just got a hole and popped. I only weight 150 pounds, so there was no issue of that, or overinflation. I couldn't find the hole, either, to repair it. Maybe I just got a bad one, I don't know. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Duck, duck, HUGE duck!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use at our lake cabin. Could not believe just how big it was! Huge! I as a grown woman and my niece and I can easily fit comfortably! If you are looking for a super large inflatable with a whimsical shape then this duck is for you! Air valve is easy to use. Definitely buy a battery powered air pump for this bad boy! It is too big to tackle by mouth. Very happy with my purchase! 😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Patch kit is worthless
customer_reviews.text: We used this at Memorial Day and all went fine. I inadvertently punctured a wing on a thorn from a nearby rose bush and it deflated overnight. Using the patch kit I thought I could seal the minute tear in the material on the wing. No such luck. The patch kit did nothing to abate the similar air loss from the prior night. I used a bIt of polyurethane sealant over the tiny, tiny hole to no avail. I'm not going to throw it away, because all I have to do is re-inflate it and it will be good for another 12 hours of play. But note: THE PATCH KIT DID NOTHING TO HELP THE DAMAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... as a birthday gift for a friend and she loved it. When we first blowed it was so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a friend and she loved it. When we first blowed it was so cool it was big and blew up fine. But now we have to reblow it up everyday and it never stays blown up and it doesn't seem to have a hole either. Overall not happy with this purchase and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mom of seamus

customer_reviews.title: Family's favourite.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool. Just a little too big for medium size house pool. Still looks great and everybody loves it. One problem. We are on the second duck now. First one lasted 4 days. Wing fell off without any serious abuse on our side. The whole thing deflated and become unusable. Seller sent a new one for repleacement within 24 hours. Impressive. Duck #2 has been there now 7 days. Still alive and well. Update a month later. Duck #2 is dead. Same issue. One of the wings fell off. Reducing rating to 1/5.

customer_reviews.title: Leak in 2 weeks just floating around.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the giant and the large. Even though they are the same brand the giant sprung a leak 2 weeks in. Since they were the same brand it really made me wonder why that happened. The giant wasn't even being used. But I saw that the large duck material is much thicker and you can tell right when you take it out of the package. Wish I could get my money back with the giant but from now on I will check the thickness of each inflatable before I buy it. The review for the large is 5 star, giant is getting a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  S

customer_reviews.title: Truly fun item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Xmas family outing. The kids and adults all loved it. The best part was to see them all struggle to get up. It's right for two adults and a baby on lap. The challenge was blowing it up. We had 5 adult men try to blow it up at the hotel. Since we opened the box at the hotel we had to go source a bicycle pimp. Would be great if the manufacturer could include a small motor included in the price or propose for purchase. It was also difficult to deflate and a pump would have made it easy. Bit of inconvenience but we managed and it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the float
customer_reviews.text: Below is my review after our second duck was returned, but we finally got the third duck and it's perfect! Adds character and color to our pool..Everyone loves the Derby Duck.. He's a big hit. YAY! Was worth the hassle free hassle of sending back.. LOVE the float! Was hoping to have it for our July 4th party but unfortunately had to return it, twice.. Seems like it's a manufacturers issue since both ducks where not sealed well at the seams. I will order it again and hope the third time is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISKA BITTAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Perfect for Lounging in and floating. Not that great for kids who like to jump on and off of it. Lol but given the price and the size of the duck, it was worth it. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren. They loved it. But after a week, it popped. I was pleasantly surprised when the seller sent me another one. Unfortunately the second one would not blow up. It wouldn't hold air in certain parts of the duck. It was the end of the summer, and we were closing the house up. I never got around to contacting the seller about the second problem. To be honest, I felt a little odd about it so just gave up. So beware
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice decoration for the pool, good for few uses before it starts to leak
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and cool. The material seems OK, better if it is thicker. The centre plug location could hurt your back if you lay flat on the duck. As of 2018-09-18, the duck is losing air. I think this toy is only good for 1 season. Most of the time, I let it float on the water as pool decoration. People sat on it for about 10 times for the season. I am a bit disappointed. Update 2019, I found the leak was at the seam which was rather difficult to fix. Then a week later, it was the hard clear plastic hose connector start to break. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: How awesome is this float?! Used an air compressor and had it blown up in about 10 minutes. It was outside in the sun all summer long with no color loss or air loss. I run about 250 and it held me like I was a feather.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Came with a tear :(
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it into the water. 2 out of the 3 values inflated fast and perfectly. The outside body underneath had a huge slit. I tried to write to the company but there wasn’t anyway to do that to try and get a replacement without having to mail this back. BUT! We patched it and it’s holding up strong. Just have to inflate daily. Very frustrating:/ I’m totally disappointed they I spent all this money and it was ripped prior to even being used. There should be a way to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw this at a pool store and decided he wanted it, the only problem is we just have an above ground pool. It still looks festive and fun sitting on the pool cover too big to float around, but it looks fun and jazzes up the pool area. The reason I gave it 4 stars was because it had a small hole and we had to patch it up. Wasn't a big deal, just frustrating for what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Sure looks nice. It deflated after a couple days and I reinflated which got me a couple more days. It's a big hit among family and friends, but if you don't want to keep pumping it up every few days, don't bother. No fatsos climbed aboard, so that wasn't the issue. Supposed to be for kids and adults alike.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Feline

customer_reviews.title: THIS KEEPS LOSING AIR
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered this item a few times and everytime it keeps losing air. I want to return the latest one but I see you will not accept a return. I am VERY disappointed in this product and service that I am unable to return. I bought this in August, and it literally starting losing air immed. I thought I would give it another shot and keep inflating it, it STILL loses air!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shapouri

customer_reviews.title: Cheap vinyl won't last!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this on May 3rd. Great untill it started to turn brown! I have no idea other than cheap. Looks like something that's been sitting outside to years it's only 3 months! All the scrubbing clean it doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Popped with j.
customer_reviews.text: I blew it up, my kids got on it and it immediately popped. My kids are thin, 3 and 6 year old... wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: juliarose

customer_reviews.title: Pool duck float
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our pool and my kids (All adult size) love it. So far it has been very durable since they are a little rough with it. Super cute duck with sunglasses perfect for teenage boys! It is plenty big to lay on and has handles on the side to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery Tx

customer_reviews.title: Hard to paddle on your own
customer_reviews.text: It was so much fun! and of good quality material. One down side, if you have short legs you can't reach the water (kids and women) because it is so high off the water, Up side..we towed it slowly with the jet ski ! and then hitched a ride with another floatie We are going to buy plastic oars to use so we can paddle around, wish they had thought of making that option on the duck!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The giant is gigantic !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a 13 yr old birthday pool party. So many kids were jumping on and off it went well over the 300lb limit, but held up. Super fun! I am taking it to the lake to pull behind a pontoon boat as it is really too large for a medium pool. Easy to inflate with an electric pump. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.

customer_reviews.title: Shop around, you can find same yellow duck a little cheaper than this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she loves yellow ducks. Easy to inflate, she was so excited! Plastic feels a little thinner than I would like but so far so good. I think the price is set a little too high, should be more in the $30’s I feel. Also I think it should have had a few patches in the box incase it’s needed, for the price I thought it would have. Most bigger pool float have one or two patches That come in the boxes, not this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boose

customer_reviews.title: Duckie defects leads to disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: We had the duck in the water 1 day and the seam to the wing came undone. Super disappointed because we saved it for our kids birthday, we are outside of the return period.
customer_reviews.author: christina murphy

customer_reviews.title: Big and cute, but slowly leaks air - BUMMMER
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Ducky is cute and fun to look at. It takes awhile to blow up because it was several chambers of air, but that's not the real issue. The problem is the Mr. Ducky slowly leaks air - right from the beginning. We bought the large white unicorn at the same time and blew them both up at the same time. The "Uni" holds air perfectly, but Mr. Ducky needs more air within a few hours. Bummer - it's a cute float and fun to lounge on, but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: longlegslouise

customer_reviews.title: Fun duck
customer_reviews.text: Only used this one entire day in the lake. It was easy to inflate and I didn’t see any holes or tears like other reviews stated. Only problem is it’s kind of awkward to sit on..just fun to jump on/off not really for lounging for a long period of time. It is really cute though and it’s fun to have around
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking pool inflatable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking pool inflatable. Only problem so far is that the outer chamber the one that fills the wings and the tail and the exterior of the body loses air. It is not a significant hole but enough that it will need blown up overnight. Don't know if this is a common occurrence or just this specific one. Cannot locate the very small leak to patch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Aspelund

customer_reviews.title: Love the duck 🦆
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my family and they love it absolutely love it. We've used it for a couple months during the summer and our pool is the talk of every conversation with you will come over. It's pretty big so if you like to sit on it with an adult and a child about two is fine after that I wouldn't recommend it because then you sit awkwardly and it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome looking, way bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome looking, way bigger than expected. Unfortunately the wing came off on one side with 20 minutes of being inflated. The wing is inflated through a large circular hole that feeds from the main body, therefore there is now a huge hole on one side. The little piece of scotch tape they give you for a patch kit did not do the trick to fix it. It was fun for 20 minutes...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Thiel

customer_reviews.title: His name is Paulo
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this duck is huge. I love him so much. It's been a little cold to use right now but I can hardly wait to ride him. Paulo adds some very nice color and also give a very nice friendly inviting smile and adds a little something extra to the outdoor space. Love him.
customer_reviews.author: Dino2012

customer_reviews.title: Wing tore off when an adult male sat on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wing tore off when an adult male sat on it in the pool. Kids under 80 lbs who were playing on it seemed to be okay. Definitely be gentle with this.
customer_reviews.author: Susuwatari

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a couple times. It’s a big difficult to deflate after use which is probably a good thing. I’ll be happy if it lasts the whole summer.
customer_reviews.author: AnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have three rambunctious grandsons and they LOVE this duck! I cannot say their mode of play is "gentle" but this has taken a beating and just continues to "smile."
customer_reviews.author: Selective shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 days. The straps for holding ores ...
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 days. The straps for holding ores were ripped off when the kids used them to climb onto it. Yes, they should have used the handle.. but it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Go to walmart or literally anywhere else, it broke within the first 3 days, we tried repairing with flex tape, only for more holes to appear. not worth the money if its the same as a knock off brand.
customer_reviews.author: DPG

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I finally gave in and purchased a few pool floaties. The duck by far was the most fun and lasted the longest. With that said, this lasted perhaps a dozen times in the pool before it ripped at the seam (about 10 inches). I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: It came torn. The product is VERY thin (think ziploc bag thin). The only thing premium here is the price you pay for an otherwise junk product.
customer_reviews.author: FuntimeFandrew

customer_reviews.title: It holds more than what it says and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: It says it can only hold about 4 people but we have had 8 on there at one time including two adults 4 kids over age of 15 and 2 younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This held up to many hours of rough housing of three grandsons. They jumped on it, flipped it, it blew out of the pool, found down in our field 100 yards away. No holes. This is great pool toy, would not suggest it for the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Will Reviews

customer_reviews.title: As expected maybe even better
customer_reviews.text: This duck is massive, but still fits in my pool, had it for a bit of time now and still no damage whatsoever, also has proven to support more than one person, wouldn’t recommend if you don’t have a large pool to put it in
customer_reviews.author: Sherry summers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing quality and durability! Not to mention the function. I bought 3 diff types including 2 unicorns and this was by far the biggest and best crowd pleasure - added benefit of cup holders! Multi-chamber and didn't once deflate on a 3 day lake trip, didn't have to add air either. Deflating was super easy as well, highly recommend this over all others.
customer_reviews.author: azreal4life

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY... FULL OF HOLES
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to take on boat trip overseas. Due to it being so large, I had to purchase a larger luggage to transport it. All of this was for NOTHING!! Upon inflating it, NUMEROUS small holes were discovered which made it impossible to use. Attempting to use the included repair patched but they did not work. I refused to pay extra$$ on luggage fees lug this huge float back... VERY disappointed in this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: JayJoi

customer_reviews.title: Bright and big.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed on how long it lasted. The wing came apart after a month of kids playing in it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Used generator to inflate. Held 2 kids easily but did not last past 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Glamma

customer_reviews.title: Totally well made and super large and cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so cute!! It is huge!!! Made very well. Not made with the cheap plastic that some rafts are. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Darr

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This duck is tons of fun! It's a great purchase for the price. Other Ducks of similar quality come with a paddle. This one does not. You must have an air pump to inflate the duck! Do not expect that you will be able to blow it up using your own lung capacity. It's not possible!
customer_reviews.author: Sheekie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My dad (who is not a pool toy guy) LOVES THIS DUCK. He gets a kick out of it. It is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: AD_13

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This item had a slow leak in the main reservoir right out of the box. The company makes it inconvenient to replace, since there's no guarantee they will cover return shipping. It will be time consuming to remove the air, dry the product off, and repackage it for return shipping. For $30 dollars, it's not worth the trouble. I wouldn't recommend this product. The company should provide a refund or replace the product no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Nosworthy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First one we received would not hold air. Sent it back. Seller repacked with another one that does not hold air. Don’t waste your money. Total garbage. One of the worse items I’ve ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Peters

customer_reviews.title: Love this floaty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. It was delivered days before expected! It’s sturdy, cute and you can fit 2 small adults on it! Very easy to inflate and deflate! Has 2 drink holders but they are not deep enough so my smaller water bottle kept falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: While adorable, the plastic has disintegrated and has a black coating on it. A Magic Eraser not so magic on it!! Kept the kids off of it, based on the reviews, but had a different death after all. Still might get another, as cute in the pool. I guess two a year okay??
customer_reviews.author: LORI B.

customer_reviews.title: Star of the Pool
customer_reviews.text: This mega duck was a real hit at the pool this summer. The kids had a blast. It lasted about a month before it took a beating by a group of teenage boys. I'm sure it would have lasted longer if the rough housing didn't take place. Boys will be boys.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Fun attraction gettin toy for the lake
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great fun toy for the kids and adults. Only thin I would change is the deflate valves. There is only one quick release valve. Since we use ours when we stop after boating it's a hassle because it takes too long to deflate
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Short life span for our duck
customer_reviews.text: We loved this duck but only had it two weeks and the entire wing popped and the whole underside deflated!! A lot of money for not a very durable float! Would have expected atleast one season out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Maepic

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this duck for the 2nd time. We bought the first duck from Sams and the 2nd identical (to the Sams duck) duck from Amazon. The first duck popped and we assumed it was user error; however, our 2nd duck broke in the exact same location. It appears the seam split apart. Unfortunately, we had only been able to use the duck for less than a month when this occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy, super fun floatie!
customer_reviews.text: We have had tons of fun with our duck. Super easy to inflate and deflate. We bring him out for parties and then deflate and store him when he’s no longer needed because it’s so easy to do. Kids absolutely love him and he’s held up to a lot of rowdy play. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: beach gal

customer_reviews.title: the quality of these inflatables have changed
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 of these last year & they lasted for months. We ordered 2 this summer & they both did not hold air for more than a day . . . leaks pre-existed with them. Sad to not be able to order them, as they were the most comfortable giant floats.
customer_reviews.author: Jomama1

customer_reviews.title: Fun but hard to get back onto
customer_reviews.text: Our duck was a hit! It's sturdy and everyone enjoyed hanging out on it during a recent tubing trip. Downside is that the bottom is so tall that when you are in deeper water (unable to stand) it's about impossible to get back onto it if you get/fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Already damaged and unusable
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month using it and it already has a hole on the side. Extremely disappointed, my original one lasted for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Silman

customer_reviews.title: Lost air
customer_reviews.text: From the 1st time it slowly lost air......... just a pain to have to continually add air.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kress

customer_reviews.title: Giant Yellow Duck Raft-Lots of Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Raft is very well constructed and was easy to inflate (I used an air compressor). My kids are having lots of fun on the Giant sized Duckie raft. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY DUCK
customer_reviews.text: Love it,,, having a lot of fun with this BIG DUCK. There is nothing quite like the feeling of having a BIG Duck in your pool... Scare the dog! Entertain the neighbors... or just grab a glass of champagne and FLOAT ...
customer_reviews.author: Cari Zubay

customer_reviews.title: Fun to own
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend in Sweden and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Andersson

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Love this duck! All 3 of my daughter's fit on it, ages 4, 7 and 11. They love pulling each other around with all the handles around the duck. The only catch is the duck is so big it's hard to move once your on him without help unless you have paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait to return something you think will work out
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this duck...received it and inflated it...and it was losing air. Amazon replaced it...but this one is still losing air. We thought we would keep it anyway — maybe it wasn’t so bad — but it is. And now want to return it. It’s cute...but defective
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Popped first use. What a shame because it was really cute but not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: The best $42 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: This was the absolute best $42 I ever spent! We bought this to bring out to the Smokey Mountains and it was perfect for floating around on the lake. Can easily hold 2 people. The cup holders don’t fit a yeti- not sure about anything else. We used an air compressor to blow him up to save time. A great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: RIP Sir Quacks A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Sir Quacks A Lot met his demise after only 2 months of periodic use. Our last giant float, Swanda, lasted more than a year with lots of use. My kids are disappointed their favorite pool animal has migrated to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Duck
customer_reviews.text: This blow up duck is huge! When I blew it up it did not fit in my car so make sure you have a way to blow it up on the go. Like anything that gets inflated it is hard to get it 100% aired but it gets close. When used we were able to fit two 20 year old people one it and had room to not be on top each other. This does not come with paddles and it is hard to move around when one it without them. Over all it is a very cool inflatable and looks just like the one pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used Once And It Deflated
customer_reviews.text: This only lasted one time in the pool with little grandkids, it's a thinner rubber/plastic than others. We have had a lot of other pool toys last a full summer season, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the float and inflated it. However the next day the head is deflated. I filled it up again to see any leak however NO and it deflated again. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monteverde

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great fun toy for the summer, the grandkids love it, they have jumped on it in the pool and it still hasn't got any leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashland

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: We blew this up, the kids floated on it one day, the next day it was inflated. It had a hole in the head. We tried to repair the hole and it deflated again. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Catlin

customer_reviews.title: Huge float love it
customer_reviews.text: Best pool flair ever caught my neighbor eyes they were amazed how huge it is it fits 4 kids or so I mean huge
customer_reviews.author: racjel2002

customer_reviews.title: Fun buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been blown up and in our pool....in the south Texas heat since the beginning of May and we have only added a little air once. It is HUGE!! Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Price

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: This duck was a surprise gift for a friends new pool,sadly we had to patch the duck as it had a leak out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Maria Stafford

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge! It got a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! It got a lot of attention when out. Held up for one use, although it's not thick and probably would not take a lot of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: April Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This float is hands down the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: We have had so many different types of large floats and NONE of them have held up as well as this duck. It holds it's air, very sturdy, easy to inflate, and is the right size for just about anyone or even two! Our dog Oakley even loves to hang out on this float!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martin

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold air
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two of these ducks and both lost lost air after a few days and now the second one loses air immediately and I can’t find the problem leak. My neighbor purchased one also and ended up throwing it away. It’s too bad this is not a quality controlled product as it is so cute and fun. Notice the swan and the flamingo in the picture. All 3 were inflated last night around 6pm and this is waist they looked like at 9 this morning
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Would of been the perfect floaty if lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Very neat if it would of lasted more then 4 hours. After getting the duck blown up it was very nest and big. However started deflating within 4 hours and our 4 your old only floated on it with parental supervision. Would of been the perfect floaty if lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: MNKayla

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After spending all that money it popped very easily I was surprised
customer_reviews.author: LORRI

customer_reviews.title: i put it where it belongs ...trash
customer_reviews.text: Even tho I bought this in 2016 i left it in its box til this past weekend...i can't believe u would even sell this ...full of mold and over 100 rips in it ...u sold me garage...couldn't even begin to patch it the whole duck was ripped in half ...terrible
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one weekend
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted one weekend, Velcro straps for the paddles pulled out and that left two large holes in the duck, don't waste your money on, looked great the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: This ducky seems to be able to handle the abuse ...
customer_reviews.text: This ducky seems to be able to handle the abuse from a bunch of 13-year olds in our pool! I really didn't expect much but it's held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: ELB

customer_reviews.title: Pool party fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was tough to blow up. My hubby had to go to Home Depot to purchase an electric pump but with one that came with different sized mouths and needles. The head requires and different size from the body. But once inflated, it was adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Deb M.

customer_reviews.title: I named mine Daisy
customer_reviews.text: Its HUGE! I used as a picture prop for over 100 kids under the age of 3. With stood them. Then, i put in the pool & has survived 3 pool parties full of teenagers
customer_reviews.author: Megen Risinger

customer_reviews.title: Fun product and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to a festival and it was very popular. Not only did it survive the Alaskan ocean, but I made it very far to places. Could use some paddles, but I bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it. Only complaint it the description about straps ...
customer_reviews.text: It's huge and gets the, lots of attention when we bring it places. My girls love it. Only complaint it the description about straps to hold a paddle is incorrect- there are no straps to put a paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Cbnana

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Lake McDonald, and had a blast! Durability seemed good, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Product is cute in the pool but does not hold air. It needs to be inflated every time you use it. It goes soft within an hour!
customer_reviews.author: lynn paul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super excited about her new float, but waited to open it to inflate it until we had guests over. When we first inflated it we noticed it immediately had a slow leak somewhere in the head/neck area. First day to use it and it wouldn't hold air. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainbyker

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grand daughters birthday. Ordered in May for gifting August 1st. Well we opened and inflated and immediately the outside ring does not hold air. Has slow leak that we cannot find. Unfortunately as I look to return, return window has closed. Lesson learned, don’t buy gifts too early.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Steigerwald

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Takes a while to inflate but once ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Takes a while to inflate but once it's inflated everyone loves it. It appears to take a bit of a beating. It got blown all over my yard until I put a leash on it so it wouldn't try and fly away in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... to hang out and HAND DOWN I had the best floatie(: My friends got the massive blow up ...
customer_reviews.text: A huge group of us got together for 4th of July to hang out and HAND DOWN I had the best floatie(: My friends got the massive blow up Bald Eagle and another got a similar one, but this one was the sturdiest, and biggest. I bought a small oar though because it was fairly hard to navigate since you're lifted completely out of the water. (Plus I am a University of Oregon Alum - Once a duck always a duck!)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Got it get it good.  Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: This duck is BIG. Love it!! Its made of thick materal and was a bissh to blow up but its great now!! Fits two normal sized adults. Has big red DSL. (Duck sucking lips). Beautiful!! Pool ready AF.
customer_reviews.author: JBB609

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions for this duck are completely wrong and misleading. This is almost 7 feet long and 6 feet wide.. which is way off from what the description said.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking air after the first week and I've been watching it deflate ever since. Will be returning this product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Slatin

customer_reviews.title: Big cool dude ducky!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and supports 250lbs without showing any signs of stress. Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Bike mad

customer_reviews.title: Realizability of product
customer_reviews.text: Your product was very disappointing. The duck never stayed inflated. We blew The duck up 3x in 12 hours and still didn’t work. .... this is not the he first time. Our son ordered an avacado and it had to be same problems...great idea for a party but not reliable and thus not worth the money....
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

product_meta.title: GAME 5000-BB Pool Rafts & Inflatable Ride-ons, Giant, Yellow
product_meta.description: Size:Giant| Style:Without PumpDesigned from high-quality materials and assembled with precise manufacturing standards, the GAME Giant Derby Duck is that perfect fun-loving oversized inflatable that is exceptional for a day at the lake, pool parties, beach vacations, and more. While there are several imitators on the market, this is the original Derby Duck, featuring the patented sunglass-wearing duck that is the star anywhere it floats. With its easy-to-inflate technology, 300-pound weight capacity, and multiple handy features, this ducky float is both stylish and functional. GAMEs Giant Derby Duck is the perfect option for fun in the sun and splish-splash entertainment. Its been designed from high-quality durable 0.03 mm vinyl materials and assembled with careful manufacturing standards to ensure longevity and extend its lifespan. Our attention to detail and quality permits this inflatable duckie to hold multiple kids or adults while boasting an impressive 300-pound weight capacity. While the material is incredibly strong, its easy to fold and store as well. It has also been designed with multiple quick-fill valves, making it easy to inflate and deflate. For those days on the water, weve added 5 handles that are easy to grasp and use. These convenient cup holders have also been designed to permit users to secure rope to them, which makes connecting with other floats, pulling them to and from the water, and tying on to a dock a snap. Additionally, this giant inflatable has two built-in cup holders, allowing you to keep your favorite cool beverage close to you while floating in comfort and style. The Giant Derby Duck is an iconic product made by Great American Merchandise and Events (GAME). GAME is a cutting-edge innovator in the special event marketing and merchandising industries. Along with manufacturing and designing high-quality products, GAME also provides services to diverse nonprofit organizations that raise millions of dollars for charities across the globe.
feature_bullets: EASY TO INFLATE: GAME’s Giant Derby Duck is an iconic giant blow-up duck, perfectly designed for a day at the pool, the river, or other aquatic fun. It’s been designed with multiple quick-fill valves, which makes it easy to inflate and deflate.

HOLDS UP TO 300 POUNDS: We’ve designed this big inflatable duck with precise manufacturing standards and high-quality materials. It has a weight capacity of up to 300 pounds and can hold multiple children or adults.

DURABLE VINYL MATERIAL: To ensure longevity and durability, GAME uses high-quality 0.03 mm vinyl in the construction of our Giant Derby Duck. The material expands yet folds easily for simple and convenient storage.

BUILT-IN CUP HOLDERS: Everybody loves a refreshing beverage while they’re floating at a pool party, the river, or other special event. To make this easy, we’ve included two built-in cup holders to be used while in lounger mode.

5 HANDLES: Climbing onboard this giant duck pool float is made easier thanks to the 5 handles infused on the sides. You can tie a rope through them, making it easy to connect with other floats, pull them around, and tie them on to a dock.
